title: College of Engineering Representative Election 2025
description: Representative election for the College of Engineering student body

candidates.name: Daniel Serrano
candidates.bio: 2nd year Computer Engineering student with active involvement in tech clubs and programming competitions.
candidates.goals: Modernize engineering labs with latest technology, organize more hands-on workshops, and create peer mentoring programs for struggling students in technical subjects.

candidates.name: Mar James Delimios
candidates.bio: 3rd year Mechanical Engineering student focused on sustainable engineering practices and innovation projects.
candidates.goals: Promote sustainable engineering practices, establish innovation labs for student projects, and bridge the gap between theoretical learning and practical industry applications.
